anathema: Engage in petty demonstrations of strength, use your strength to take advantage of others
edict: Offer your strength to aid others, protect those weaker than you
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Trudd (The Mighty)](/Deities.aspx?ID=451)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 306

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Dwarven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=6)

**Edicts** Offer your strength to aid others, protect those weaker than you

**Anathema** Engage in petty demonstrations of strength, use your strength to take advantage of others

**Area of Concern**
Bravery, defense, strength

**Pantheons**
[Stone's Blood](/Deities.aspx?ID=382)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Warhammer](/Weapons.aspx?ID=403)

**Domains** [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=2348)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553)

- **4th**
[Mountain Resilience](/Spells.aspx?ID=1610)

</column>
name: Trudd (The Mighty)
religious_symbol: Warhammer in front of a golden shield
